blogPost.title: What are some tips for communicating with your boss and colleagues about what you need as a working parent, without getting penalized? Answer by Daisy Dowling, author of Workparent. https://t.co/griHGSKFDV https://t.co/HA20FfheMk
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 働く親として必要なことを、ペナルティを受けずに上司や同僚に伝えるコツは何でしょうか？回答者：Daisy Dowling（『Workparent』の著者） https://t.co/griHGSKFDV https://t.co/HA20FfheMk
在与你的老板和同事沟通你作为职业父母的需求时，有什么技巧，而不会受到惩罚？回答者：Daisy Dowling，Workparent的作者。https://t.co/griHGSKFDV https://t.co/HA20FfheMk
在與你的老闆和同事溝通你作爲職業父母的需求時，有什麼技巧，而不會受到懲罰？回答者：Daisy Dowling，Workparent的作者。https://t.co/griHGSKFDV https://t.co/HA20FfheMk

previous.title: How do ideas spread and what’s the link to how they are communicated? Answer by @lukeburgis, Author of Wanting. https://t.co/OG2cgpbjVF https://t.co/3avILwPOiP

localize.full_text: アイデアはどのようにして広がり、その伝え方には何か関連があるのでしょうか？Answer by @lukeburgis, Author of Wanting. https://t.co/OG2cgpbjVF https://t.co/3avILwPOiP
思想是如何传播的，与它们的传播方式有什么联系？回答者：@lukeburgis，《想》作者。https://t.co/OG2cgpbjVF https://t.co/3avILwPOiP
思想是如何傳播的，與它們的傳播方式有什麼聯繫？回答者：@lukeburgis，《想》作者。https://t.co/OG2cgpbjVF https://t.co/3avILwPOiP

next.title: Where can you get more information on skin cancer? Answer by @KeckMedUSC, 500+ internationally renowned doctors. https://t.co/NYoLLjp1HP https://t.co/cHOZsl4Ssa

localize.full_text: 皮膚がんについての詳しい情報はどこで得られますか？Answer by @KeckMedUSC, 500+ international renowned doctors. https://t.co/NYoLLjp1HP https://t.co/cHOZsl4Ssa
在哪里可以获得更多关于皮肤癌的信息？回答者：@KeckMedUSC，500多名国际知名医生。https://t.co/NYoLLjp1HP https://t.co/cHOZsl4Ssa
在哪裏可以獲得更多關於皮膚癌的信息？回答者：@KeckMedUSC，500多名國際知名醫生。https://t.co/NYoLLjp1HP https://t.co/cHOZsl4Ssa
